titleStmt.title: Tryals per pais, or, The law concerning juries by nisi-prius, &c. methodically composed for the publick good, in the 16th year of the reign of our Soveraign Lord Charls the Second, King of England, Scotland, France and Ireland, &c. by S.E. of the Inner-Temple, Esquire.
titleStmt.author: Euer, Samson.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Streater, James Flesher, and Henry Twyford; the assigns of Richard Atkyns and Edward Atkyns, Esquires,

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to S. Euer.
Errors in paging: 199 numbered 169; 220 numb. 20; 233 numb. 234.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
